MicroPython API

  • btn_onboard — Onboard Button
  • color_sensor — Color Sensor Module
  • ir_receiver — IR Receiver Sensor
  • ir_sender — IR Sender
  • lcd_1602 — LCD 1602 Module
  • led_matrix — LED Matrix
  • led_onboard — Onboard LED
  • line_array — Line Array Module
  • motion — Motion
  • motor — Motor
  • oled_i2c — OLED I2C Module
  • pins — Pins
  • robot — Robot
  • servo — Servo
  • speaker — Speaker
  • ultrasonic — Ultrasonic Module
